item.title: A web about Statistics, Modelling and Programming
item.description: Welcome! This a documentation web about statistical theory, modelling and implimentation. We try to cover brief theory about models being used as well as implementations on some programming languages like R and Python. Quick start Install with git: git clone git@github.com:digitalcraftsman/hugo-material-docs.git themes/hugo-material-docs Features Beautiful, readable and very user-friendly design based on Google’s material design guidelines, packed in a full responsive template with a well-defined and easily customizable color palette, great typography, as well as a beautiful search interface and footer.

item.title: Geostatistics
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.

item.title: Markdown test
item.description: Welcome! This a documentation web about statistical theory, modelling and implimentation. We try to cover brief theory about models being used as well as implementations on some programming languages like R and Python. Theme Material is a theme for Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. It is built using Google’s material design guidelines, fully responsive, optimized for touch and pointer devices as well as all sorts of screen sizes.

item.title: Concepts of Statistics and Probabilitieds
item.description: Welcome! This a documentation web about statistical theory, modelling and implimentation. We try to cover brief theory about models being used as well as implementations on some programming languages like R and Python. Theme Material is a theme for Hugo, a fast and flexible static site generator. It is built using Google’s material design guidelines, fully responsive, optimized for touch and pointer devices as well as all sorts of screen sizes.
